name: Blink (itch) (osis)
description:
Blink is a game about a little goo that found a light-emitting gem that gave him the power to teleport!

Help Blink use his newfound abilities to escape from the sinister EyeBoys and the stalward FryBoys. Blink's power is limited to lit-up areas of the screen, so make sure not to get cornered!

Don't want to download a mysterious .exe? Please play our web build here.

GMTK JAM DISCLAIMER: The web build was built after the deadline of the jam, but with no changes to any code or assets. For judgement purposes, or if you're concerned that work was done after the jam deadline, please use the downloadable .exe of the game!

ART: Angelo @_t3nshi

CODE: Aidan @itsjustaidan

AUDIO: Leandro @sakana_cookies
